daily_activities: Speedboat transfer to Helengeli Island Resort
Check-in at the resort and relax on the beach
Island hopping to nearby islands for sightseeing
Snorkeling to explore the coral reefs and marine life
Sightseeing tour of the local island, including the Helengeli Island village
Visit to the island's historic sites and landmarks
Full-day sightseeing tour of the atolls and coral reefs
Opportunity to spot manta rays and whale sharks
Relaxation day at the resort, with optional water sports and activities
Sightseeing tour of the nearby fishing villages and local markets
Cultural experience and interaction with the local community
Excursion to the nearby deserted islands for sightseeing and snorkeling
Speedboat transfer back to Malé International Airport

travel_instructions.estimated_travel_time: Approximately 5 hours and 30 minutes to 6 hours (including layovers)
travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight to Malé (Velana International Airport) with airlines such as IndiGo, SpiceJet, or SriLankan Airlines, likely with a layover in cities like Mumbai, Delhi, or Colombo. Then, from Malé, take a speedboat or seaplane to Helengeli Island, which may take around 30 minutes to 1 hour, depending on the mode of transportation and weather conditions.
